ing: 3 carrots, peeled and cut in chunks
n: Sushi House Salad Dressing, It's ORANGE!
des: "Sushi bar salad is a must with the standard orange dressing! This is IT! You do not want to blend oil too long or you will get a mayonnaise consistency."
ins: Place carrots, ginger root, soy sauce, vinegar, and orange juice into a blender; blend until liquified. Pour in peanut oil and pulse once or twice just to combine.
